bug.author: Jasperty
bug.summary: do you have the pruning api for tensorflow model?
bug.description: i use tensorflow, not keras, but i find your api is for keras

comments.comment: We only explicitly target the tf.keras API (see details <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/model_optimization/guide/pruning#overview>here</denchmark-link> ). If you're looking for an API for TensorFlow (in 1.X), you can use <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/model_pruning/Pruning>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/model_pruning/Pruning</denchmark-link> . Note that no further updates will be made to that library and contrib is going away in 2.XX.
